svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/69.0.3497.81 Safari/537.36" version="9.1.8" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 120px; max-width: 580px; width: 580px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.span: Cluster compute service equipped with five 4-core nodes, "hpc.edu/node_1" to "hpc.edu/node_5".
